reviews.review: Portal 2 definitivamente é um excelente jogo, sendo extremamente divertido, onde você joga horas e horas sem ter noção do tempo, recomendo a compra dele, ainda mais se tiver um amigo para jogar junto.
imo this game has an amazing storyline

Pretty easy to get into if you have played the first Portal game. Works well on low spec machines. Even if you finish the game, Steam Workshop has been implemented so it feels like custom levels are actually in the game.
No option to play co op with randoms for lonely people :( 9.9/10 Would recommend.
best game i have ever played by far i say with a heavy heart support inersloth by playing among us
Я получил пизды от шарика какова-та
mindestens 10 stündiges gutes spiel erlebnis (nicht die comunnity maps eingeschlossen)
Just buy it, you will not regret buying it if you like smart puzzles mixed with storyline and maybe co-op.
ну если ты не тупой то сойдет

A whole new level, even compared to its prequel. During the last days of my deceased PC, nothing ever enjoyed me better than this one. What I'd give for another Portal game.

If you're reading this, stop wasting your time and enjoy Portal, enjoy GLaDOS, enjoy Wheatley (oh my cutie), and enjoy Space Core. Go! What are you waiting for?
Шедевр,одна из лучших игр в мире )
Damn, it really compliments the first game. Freaking masterpiece

Oyundaki bulmacalar, topluluk haritaları gayet güzel. Ben indirimde 3 tl gibi bir fiyata aldım size de kesinlikle öneririm 3 tl vererek 17 saatlik muhteşem bir oyun deneyimi yaşadım. 11-12 saat yaklaşık oyunun kendi hikayesi geri kalan saatler iise arkadaşlarımla veya kendi başıma topluluk haritalarında oynadım.

portal of a smoker that've been completely VALVE'SED like left 4 dead 2 with simple/tarded toxic humor and general absence of real PORTAL's  mood, fake for commercial profit which stands on idea and experiment of Erik Wolpaw and Marc Laidlaw
Wheatley is super nice at first but then he becomes a dickhead, recommend
I've never had so much fun killing my friends.10/10 friendship ruiner
this is portal 2 one of the best games of all time how can you not have it
Every aspect of Portal 2 from game mechanics to the voice acting is just perfect. The Co-op part was one of the best experience I've ever had. Everyone should play this game at one point.

Отличная игра с простым сюжетом.
Интересные и смешные монологи. Прекрасный саундтрек.
Почти все головоломки решаются легко, но на некоторых придется "попотеть".
Parasını Hakediyor Duo da Güzel Ama Solo En İyisi Ayrıca Kartlarda Düştüğü İçin Beleş 5 Tl Falan Gelir Tavsiye Ederim
Such an amazing story from the original. There's basically 6-8 hours worth of story and new puzzles. Highly recommend!
крутая концовка всем советую поиграть и в одиночку и в кооп с другомЁ!

The woman attached to the game is very rude and hateful. 
 tho i like the game ><
Для некоторых весело, для кого то скучно. Но игра классная и стоит своих денег.
Is there someone who hasn't play Portal?

The best fucking story I've ever seen in a game, even the Rule 34 is great and I'm not even in to robots. But the way they use those gels makes me want to shoot a portal in front of me and behind me so I can fuck my own asshole. 11/10
un bel gioco divertente ma è molto molto corto :/
Titolo da non perdere, consiglio di giocare anche il primo capitolo per capire bene certe meccaniche di gioco
Portal 2 je důkazem toho že pokračování nejsou špatná.Příběh jsem si velice užil a kooperace je taky sranda.
portal 2 is an amazing and innovative game with an amazing story, however they forgot the number 3 which is kind of dissapointing
oi oi oi oi erwin erwin pp peee peee
Best PvP game I've ever played! I don't get why it's labeled as co-op though...
its great for team building and me and my bf enjoyed working our brains together, the solo campaign has a satisfying ending
Good sequel so different yet it still works. Suprising
Probably the best game ever. Music bops too

Playing this game really reminded me why its considered a classic. Great puzzle design, Funny characters, A multiplayer campaign that will tear your friendships apart, And a tragic backstory for our favorite orange eyed artificial rival.

Basically, GET. THE. GAME. Its worth the time sink.

Um jogo EXCELENTE uma história brilhante e comandos bem legais tenho certeza que esse jogo vai fritar seu cérebro recomendo d+ recomendo tbm esperar uma sale pra economizar uns trocados, adorei esse game<3
havent played portal 1 as of 3/3/21 but plan on playing it some time soon, but this game is astounding honestly. play it all the time
C'est le meilleur jeu auquel j'ai joué.
this is a great puzzle game that will get you playing for hours with good comedy too
It is super fun to play together with a friend! You have to interact in a very impressive way and it is the best co-op game. Wish the co-op story was longer.
Best thinking game I've ever played! The animation is amazing too. The way the robots function in relation to the audio clips is incredible. I'd rate it five stars if I could.
